product.name: Banana
product.description: Bananas are a favourite breakfast choice or snack, at anytime of the day since they are soft, sweet, and delicious. The bright yellow peel provides natural protection while keeping the fruit and serves as a good indicator of when it's time to consume it!

product.name: Pear
product.description: Pears will give every fruit dish a distinct flavour. They deliver delicious sweetness. Salad dressings, preserves, and chutneys can be made using them.

product.name: Apple
product.description: Apples are a family favourite for snacks, salads, and sauces because of their mild yet sweet flavour. The apple's distinctive appearance is created by a combination of vivid red and delicate traces of green.

product.name: Radishes
product.description: Radishes come in a variety of sizes and colours, ranging from spherical to carrot-shaped with white skin. Depending on the cultivar, they are crisp and have a moderate or peppery flavour. Salads and sandwiches can be made with raw radishes, or as a simple side dish, roast whole with butter.

product.name: Carrots
product.description: Carrots are a terrific snack as well as a great addition to any meal. salads or as a side dish Vitamin C and beta-carotene are abundant.

product.name: Tomato
product.description: Pears will give every fruit dish a distinct flavour. They deliver delicious sweetness. Salad dressings, preserves, and chutneys can be made using them.
